content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today with your HVAC needs?
I need my AC fixed, but I want the absolute best tech, not some rookie. My place is downtown. Can you guarantee that?
I understand you want top quality service. Could I please get your full name to help set things up?
It's Josh. Let’s not waste time, just tell me when a top tech is available downtown.
Thanks, Josh. Can you please confirm your exact address so we can ensure we're assigning the best technician in your area?
Downtown, that’s enough. If you need a full street address I’m not giving it just yet — too many scams these days.
To confirm service area and availability of the best technician, I need a bit more detailed location than just 'Downtown'. Could you please provide a street or nearby landmark?
Look, I want this done right, not scheduled days from now. What’s your earliest slot with your best tech? Don’t ask for info I don’t want to give.

I want to make sure we can send the best technician to your location. Without an address, I can't confirm availability. Could you please provide either a nearby landmark or partial street name? It helps us serve you better.
Fine. It's near Central Park. But I’m not booking yet until I know the full cost and time.
Thanks, Josh. I am calculating our service area based on 'near Central Park' now.
You're well within our service range. When would be your ideal time for the service?
Tomorrow anytime, but I want the job done quickly with no excuses. What's the price exactly? No surprises.
I will check available slots for tomorrow and provide you with a price estimate.

We have availability tomorrow afternoon with our top HVAC technician. The typical cost for your service is around $250, but a final quote will be given after inspection. Would you like me to book this slot for you now?
I want it before noon. Afternoon is a no. And $250 is too much if it's a simple fix. Can you guarantee no extra charges or no deal.

Unfortunately, our earliest slot with a top technician tomorrow is in the afternoon. We can't offer a guaranteed fixed price without seeing the issue first. Would you prefer to book the available slot or keep looking?
Seems you can’t meet my needs. Maybe I’ll look elsewhere.
reason: Customer unwilling to accept available time and pricing conditions.
